title: "Hybe acquires 56.1 percent stake in AI sound startup Supertone"
excerpt: "Hybe, the Korean entertainment agency behind supergroup BTS, said Tuesday it has invested 45 billion won ($36.5 million) to acquire 56.1 percent of stake in Supertone, an artificial intelligence (AI) sound startup."
